name: उदो उदो येमाई ।
search_txt: udho udho yemai aadishakti ambabai ho

name: आरती अंबा पदकमला ।
search_txt: aarti amba padakamla sevi sadbhave kamla

name: आरती अंबाबाईची । त्रिपुर सुंदरी ।

ujalonni hridaya gyan jyoti lavu vishaymoha vati

name: उदो उदो रेणुकेचा ।
search_txt: udho udho renukecha amravati vas jicha

baraya tera sajati pude renuchi duhiti
haar gala kavadiyancha mugutamani bahu ratnacha

name: ओवाळू आरती । शिवसांबे ।
search_txt: oovalu aarti shivsambe trigun rupi rambhe

search_txt: jay jay brahmavilasi shree mrugarajachal rahivasi ho

search_txt: jay jay renuke sada saday tu prasanna rupamurti

search_txt: jay devi jay devi jay mangalnilaye

name: जय जय शिखरेश्वर भगवंते।
search_txt: jay jay shikhareshwari bhagavante bhavani anusuye mate
kumkum kankan soubhagye aakhandit mandit vimlange
shubhasani shobhasi anurage jaditmani makhar padmarage
padmajatmak mansarange guru dattatraya maya gange
mahasati devahuti tanuja kapil mahamunichi tu anuja
bhavasharamisiddhi tishati riddhi vipul samruddhi
shangunalankrut shreemante krupa karit anusuye mate

name: ही आदिमाया जगदंबा ।
search_txt: he aadimaya jagadamba renuka kulaswamini amba
jagrut karuni nirankara nirguna aanile aakara
trividha guna lavuni sansara rachila jagadambar sara
bhu jala teja gagan vara bahu tatvancha parivara

sakalahi shrushti mularambha renuka kulaswamini amba

name: विपुल दयाधन गर्जे ।
search_txt: vipul dayadhan garje tava hridayabari shri renuke ho
palabhar nara morachi karunavani hi aayake
sharamalisa kheluni nachuni gondhal ghaluni bramhagani ho
nijalisa kashi dinanchi chinta soduni antakarni ho
utha lavakar jagadambe trailokyachi tu swamini ho
vidhi hari hara adhyani purna gyani tu shahani ho
samartha parameshwari tu anant bramhanda nayake ho

name: श्री रेणुके। जय भगवंते।
search_txt: shi renuke jai bhagavante aababte
achinte jayavante daitya nihante
he shubhavadane chitsukha sadane shri vardatta shreemante
bhav amba udita jagadamba mudit
tu surbhidudhit ye ek kudit
sada anandit sukhar vandit pratipal khsudhit nija bala rudit
tuja ka na vidita he hridayasthe

name: हरी ॐ जय जय जय दुर्गे ।
search_txt: hari om jay jay durge
bhavabhayaharini mata sukhakarini durge
hari om jay jay jay durge

name: जागृत दैवत माझे आई ।
search_txt: jagrut daivat maza aai

name: चरणामृद कोमले।\nसुंदर तुळजा माता।
search_txt: charnamrut komale jaise jopatra bale o

name: रत्नागिरी पर्वती ।
search_txt: ratnagiri parvati mangalmurti tu nandasi oo

name: पिंगळा भवानी जगदंबा ।
search_txt: pingla bhavani jagadamba tarak vishwachi amba

mahishasur mardini ti shumbha nishumbha harini ti

vriksha latanchi zadi vari suramya vanaraji hi bari
asa ha that aagla vegla marga ha nit
amba tu mata amchi jeevan jyoti sakalachi

name: निरुपम ही जगदंबा |
search_txt: nirupam hi jagadamba vithabai sneha kadamba ho

search_txt: dakshin deshamadhe ek mya tuljapur dekhile ho

darshanala yeti bramha vishnu shiv shankar ho

search_txt: pratham mularambha ghatshobha toran makhar stambha

search_txt: matapur uncha parvat ambe avaghad ghat
aranya mahadongar vruksha lagale daata

mulapeeth drishi mya dekhile
maze hartil kashta
